review: The Fire Stick is a no-brainer if you have Prime and are looking to get into a streaming device. For me, I got in on the $19 sale and decided to add it to a different TV than my AppleTV3, but now have them installed side-by-side, because they have very different content (now...see below). It works well right out of the box. Had no issues with a Sony LCD from 2008; it gets power from the USB port that was only for firmware updates. Where this thing blows AppleTV3 out of the water is, with a little no-how, you can also easily install XBMC/Kodi (or other apps) onto the Stick....and now you can stream the whole internet! Riki can do the same, but not for the price.
